It offers uniquely customized products and services for each customer, independent of size and location.

jobs.title: Partner - CMO (Chief Marketing Officer)
jobs.description:
Omikron is looking for an accomplished professional to fill the role of Partner - Chief Marketing Officer. The right candidate should be able to inspire and lead the Marketing & Communications teams of the Omikron Ecosystem (Omikron Bank, Investment Management, Factoring Services and Wealth Management). 
based on her/his relevant expertise and experience in the Financial Services Industry in the EU. 

The key objectives of the Partner will be: 

a. Develop the Marketing & Communications structure for the entire Omikron Ecosystem
b. Assist with the Marketing & Communications module digitization (ERP & CRM implementations/ Custom Banking Platform)
c. Coordinate with the Chief Commercial Director to develop and promote the Omikron Brand
d. Lead the Marketing & Communications team efficiently and effectively
e. Achieve all the relevant QRPC objectives (Quality-Risk-Performance-Compliance) 

Remuneration :

A) 1% Equity is offered against the initial 6 months of work, 8 months max for extenuating circumstances.

B) Month 7 or Month 9 onwards: Competitive Salary (internationally) independent of dividends

Equity of 1% is projected to yield ~USD 120K in the first year of operation, and over USD 200K from Y2 onwards. The major shareholder will reinvest 70%-80% of profits into the operating businesses annually.

Currently, the discounted valuation of 1% Equity in the Omikron Ecosystem is approximately EUR 1,1M.

Incorporation location: 
The company for which Equity is offered is based in the UK. The Ecosystem will expand to the USA, Southern Africa and Asia.

The Business model is to a great extent validated with a backlog of SME customers, so the opportunity and prospects that are offered can be quantified objectively as excellent.

jobs.title: Partner- CDO (Chief Digital Officer)
jobs.description:
Omikron is looking for a very experienced professional to fill the role of Partner - Chief Digital Officer. The right candidate should be able to inspire and lead the Digital Team of the Omikron Ecosystem (Omikron Bank, Investment Management, Factoring Services and Wealth Management) based on her/his relevant expertise and experience in a regulated Industry preferably in Financial Services. 

The key functions of the Partner are: 

a. Design the Digital Architecture of the Omikron Ecosystem (software, hardware, services)
b. Develop and oversee the necessary requirements management process for Digitalization of the entire business model
c. Lead and coordinate all Software and Application development for the entire Omikron Ecosystem
d. Collaborate with the COO and the Director of Business Processes to develop all subordinate processes of the Digital Architecture. 
e. Collaborate with the R&D Director to constantly integrate all relevant state of the art technologies across all functions of the Omikron Digital Architecture.
f. Coordinate with the Director of Cybersecurity to implement the necessary measures and processes in the Digital Architecture. 
g. Achieve all the relevant QRPC objectives (Quality-Risk-Performance-Compliance)

 
Initially, most of the work will be completed remotely and through digital mediums. The bases of operations that will be created gradually from the second quarter of 2020 onwards in major EU countries, the USA, and Southern Africa.

Remuneration :

A) 1% Equity is offered against the initial 6 months of work, 8 months max for extenuating circumstances.

B) Month 7 or Month 9 onwards: Competitive Salary (internationally) independent of dividends

Equity of 1% is projected to yield ~USD 120K in the first year of operation, and over USD 200K from Y2 onwards. 
Currently, the discounted valuation of 1% Equity in the Omikron Ecosystem is approximately EUR 1,1M.

Incorporation location: 
The company for which Equity is offered is based in the UK. The Ecosystem will expand to the USA, Southern Africa and Asia.

The Business model is to a great extent validated with a backlog of SME customers, so the opportunity and prospects that are offered can be quantified objectively as excellent. Omikron will be offering services before the end of 2020.

jobs.title: Partner- CFO (Chief Finance Officer)
jobs.description:
Omikron is looking for a very experienced professional - preferably in Financial Services - to fill the role of Partner - Chief Finance Officer. The right candidate should be able to inspire and lead the Omikron Ecosystem financial services team. The Omikron Ecosystem will comprise of the Omikron Bank, Investment Management company, Financial Services platforms, and Wealth Management entity.  

KEY OBJECTIVES OF THE ROLE

a. Develop the Financial management Module for our Ecosystem, along with the necessary services, processes, and functions.
b. Manage all Finance and Accounting aspects of our Ecosystem and its subsidiary companies, developing the optimal financial strategy based on our Vision and Strategy
c. Collaborate with the CIO towards the achievement of the capital-raising objectives
d. Represent the Ecosystem companies to Regulatory Authorities and potential investors
e. Collaborate with the CResO (Chief Resources Officer)  to optimize the use of financial resources throughout the Ecosystem and its operations
f. Lead and inspire the Financial Services team, creating team member engagement with the Ecosystem Vision and Mission.
g. Collaborate with the CRO (Chief Risk Officer) and the Performance & Quality Director to ensure that the Ecosystem companies comply with the regulatory and legal framework in every jurisdiction internationally.


KEY REQUIREMENTS OF THE PARTNER

a. Ambitious and entrepreneurial spirit eager to innovate.
b. Team player with the intent to be an active partner and contributor to the long-term success of the Ecosystem
c. Experience with setting up and coordinating remote, multi-national teams
d. Ability to inspire and lead team members efficiently and effectively
e. Experience with capital raising campaigns, investor presentations and negotiations
f. Considerable knowledge of Finance management with the utilization of technology and new organizational concepts.
g.  Acceptance of Sustainability and Sustainable Development as the way forward for the 21st Century.

Initially, most of the work will be completed remotely and through digital mediums. The bases of operations that will be created gradually from the second quarter of 2020 onwards in major EU countries, the USA, and Southern Africa.

REMUNERATION:

A) 1% Equity against the initial 6 months of work, 8 months max for extenuating circumstances. Equity is undiluted. 

B) Month 7 or Month 9 onwards: Competitive salary after the initial period based on turnover, KPIs and salaries in similar entities

Equity of 1% is projected to yield ~USD 120K in the first year of operation, and over USD 200K from Y2 onwards. The major shareholder will reinvest 70%-80% of profits into the operating businesses annually.

Currently, the discounted valuation of 1% Equity in the Omikron Ecosystem is approximately EUR 1,1M.

INCORPORATION LOCATION:
The Equity offered is in a UK holding company covering all Regions. The Ecosystem will expand to the USA, Southern Africa, and Asia.

The Business model is to a great extent validated with a backlog of SME customers, so the opportunity and prospects that are offered can be quantified objectively as excellent. Omikron will be offering services to clients before the end of 2020.

jobs.title: Partner-Web & Online Applications Director
jobs.description:
Omikron is looking for an experienced professional to fill the role of Partner - Web & Online Applications Director. The right candidate should be able to inspire and lead the Online Applications Team of the Omikron Ecosystem (Omikron Bank, Investment Management, Factoring Services, and Wealth Management) based on her/his relevant expertise and experience in a regulated Industry preferably in Financial Services. 

The key functions of the Partner are: 

a. Develop and deploy visually & artistically engaging and technically competent online communication websites and applications in collaboration with the CMO-Chief Marketing Officer
b. Develop, deploy and maintain the investment platforms and applications that Omikron launches in collaboration with the CMO-Chief Marketing Officer and other Management team members
c. Assist with the design and deployment of all digital modules of the Omikron platform
d. Lead and inspire the Web & Online Team towards results, team growth and commitment to the Omikron Vision
e. Maintain a connection with the artistic and technical state of the art for online content presentation and application development. 
f. Achieve all the relevant QRPC objectives (Quality-Risk-Performance-Compliance) set by the strategic and operational plan of Omikron.

Key Requirements of the Role:

a.  Ambitious and entrepreneurial spirit eager to innovate and provide cutting-edge, unconventional solutions to critical customer problems
b. Team player with the intent to be an active partner and contributor to the long-term success of the Ecosystem
c. Experience with working in and coordinating remote, multi-national teams
d. Ability to inspire and lead team members efficiently and effectively
e. Very competent project manager, being able to produce results while handling multiple projects
f. Considerable knowledge of consumer psychology and behavior.
g. Acceptance of Sustainability and Sustainable Development as the way forward for the 21st Century
